Sweepstakes are brilliant for increasing...

attachments.displayName:
Great post here on how to run a successful social media sweepstake.

Sweepstakes are brilliant for increasing your brand awareness and engagement around your social media presence (which is especially important on Facebook, as the more people interact with your page, the more they will see your posts).

They could also bring you potential new customers too

Click below to read the post....

http://www.socialmediaexaminer.com/social-media-sweepstakes/


Please share this with anyone you think will find it useful.


Have you ever done a sweepstake? How did it go?



Dr Daz - Community Manager

object.content:
Great post here on how to run a successful social media sweepstake.

Sweepstakes are brilliant for increasing your brand awareness and engagement around your social media presence (which is especially important on Facebook, as the more people interact with your page, the more they will see your posts).

They could also bring you potential new customers too

annotation: Hi +Sian Foster I thought you might be interested in this.
